mapper.select: select * from ppg_info order by pi_num desc
select * from ppg_info where pi_target=rpad(#{piTarget},6,' ') and pi_source=rpad(#{piSource},6,' ')and pi_text=#{piText}
mapper.insert: insert into ppg_info(pi_num, pi_source, pi_target, pi_text, pi_result, pi_cnt) values(seq_pi_num.nextval, #{piSource}, #{piTarget}, #{piText}, #{piResult}, 1)
mapper.update: update ppg_info set pi_cnt =pi_cnt+1 where pi_num=#{piNum}
